Description: Handle zone sherd of Chian pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed black with two added white bands; exterior, slip mostly worn; part of guilloche pattern.
Curator's comments: Guilloche patterns in handle zones are common to most Chian pottery types. Given the size of the sherd, the lack of decoration on the inside does not provide any further information.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0364) (phase 2)
